settings.heading: Does Inkkas offer Free Shipping?
settings.content:
• Yes, Inkkas is happy to offer FREE shipping within the Continental U.S. on all orders of $175 or more! 
  • Free shipping to Canada for orders of $200 or more. 
  • Free shipping does not apply to Alaska, Hawaii and Puerto Rico.

settings.heading: Where does Inkkas ship?
settings.content:
Inkkas ships worldwide via USPS and UPS for domestic orders, via DHL Express Worldwide for non-Canada international orders, and via USPS Priority International for Canada orders. 

International orders:

  • DHL Express Worldwide rates vary widely depending upon the country where the items are being shipped. The best way to find a shipping quote for an international order is to use the shipping calculator during checkout.
  • International (DHL) orders are not eligible for free shipping discounts.
  • Please allow an extra business day for customs paperwork processing when ordering to ship international. 
  • Note Inkkas is not liable for any customs duties and taxes on outbound shipment to international customers. Customs duties taxes are the sole responsibility of the recipient.

settings.heading: How long does it take for an order to arrive?
settings.content:
• Domestic orders usually take between 4 - 10 business days to arrive to your address from the moment you purchase it on our website unless the item is on pre-order.
  • Items that are available for pre-order will be indicated as pre-order BEFORE you make a purchase and will indicate an estimated shipping date on the product page.
  • International orders typically take between 14 - 20 business days to arrive due to the fact that our shipping center is located in the US.

settings.heading: Do I have to add shipping to the price?
settings.content:
• We automatically add shipping to your total cost during the checkout process, once you select the shipping method you prefer.
  • FREE shipping on domestic orders of $175+ is also automatically applied wherever eligible.

settings.heading: Will I receive a tracking number once I order a pair of Inkkas?
settings.content: Yes. You will be sent an automatic email with a tracking number once your order ships. The tracking number will enable you to track the shipment from our fulfillment center to its destination.

settings.heading: My shoes are on pre-order. How do I know when they will ship?
settings.content: If your item is on pre-order, the product page will show the estimated shipping date at the time of your order. Then, once your order has shipped, you will be notified via e-mail with a tracking number. If you have any questions about the status of your pre-order, please contact customer service at support@Inkkas.com.

settings.heading: I have contacted Inkkas customer service, when will I hear back?
settings.content:
Inkkas support agents are available between 9:00 AM to 5:00 PM EST, Monday to Friday. We are committed to responding to inquiries within 24 to 48 hours during business hours. You can reach us at support@inkkas.com.  Please note that we do not respond to inquiries during weekends and/or holidays.

For urgent matters or if you haven't received a response from our customer service team in 48- 72 hours (sometimes replies go to spam), please email us at ops@inkkas.com.

settings.heading: What can I do with old Inkkas I no longer wear?
settings.content: Inkkas is always looking for ways to reduce waste, so we encourage all of our customers that are finished using a pair to donate them. There are quality programs across the country and donation centers that will take used shoes. Our partner organization that does a great job taking used shoes and repurposing them is Soles4Souls (https://soles4souls.org). Please continue to support our mission of sustainable habits by donating your used shoes instead of throwing them in the trash.

settings.heading: My item arrived damaged or defective. How can I return it?
settings.content: Oh no! We apologize for this inconvenience. If your order was purchased within 30 days, please contact us at support@inkkas.com with your order number and details about the damage or defect.

settings.heading: RETURN POLICY (CANADA)
settings.content:
• All returns/exchanges will be sent to our CA Returns Center located in Ottawa, ON. 
  • Our return policy is the same as US orders (Free returns within 7 days of receipt).
  • The return shipping costs for orders returned after the 7-day free shipping window will vary depending on the country region.

settings.heading: Return Policy (INTERNATIONAL)
settings.content: • For return/exchange requests on orders outside of the US and Canada, please contact us directly at ops@inkkas.com.
